ygData.subject: refamiliarizing myself
ygData.msgSnippet: After taking a long break from Evercrack at the Betty Ford Clinic I m back. I actually did forgat a few things and want to refamiliarize myself, On the 3 bars
ygData.messageBody:
After taking a long break from Evercrack at the Betty Ford Clinic I'm
back. I actually did forgat a few things and want to refamiliarize
myself, On the 3 bars that tell you your health and level status, I
forgot what the blue line is for. I know it has something to do with
your charma or something like that.

Also I just started playing with a Necro just to see what it's like. Any
good suggestion for getting Necro stuff? BTW I'm a Gnome.

What are the elements a Magician needs to conjure up a elementa pet like
fire or earth? I ran out and now I can't remember what I need to get!
What a dummy! ;-)

Thanks again!
Durgaa
Shizney
